comment: Even today , the Speaker and her allies keep contradicting themselves . They say their case is already overwhelming , beyond any reasonable doubt . But they also keep asking the Senate to re-do their homework and add to the investigation that House Democrats rushed to close .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / keep-02
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (s / speaker)))
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / ally-01
                              :ARG2 p)))
            :ARG1 (c / contradict-01
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 a)
            :time (t / today
                  :mod (e / even)))
      :snt2 (s2 / say-01
            :ARG0 (t2 / they)
            :ARG1 (o / overwhelm-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / case-03
                        :ARG0 (t3 / they))
                  :time (a3 / already)
                  :concession (b / beyond
                        :op1 (d / doubt-01
                              :ARG1-of (r / reasonable-02)))))
      :snt3 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (k2 / keep-02
                  :ARG0 (t4 / they)
                  :ARG1 (a4 / ask-02
                        :ARG0 t4
                        :ARG1 (a5 / and
                              :op1 (d2 / do-02
                                    :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Senate"))
                                    :ARG1 (h2 / homework
                                          :poss t4))
                              :op2 (a6 / add-02
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG2 (ii / investigate-01
                                          :ARG1-of (c4 / close-01
                                                :ARG0 (p3 / person
                                                      :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                                            :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization
                                                                  :name (n2 / name
                                                                        :op1 "House"
                                                                        :op2 "Democrats"))))
                                                :ARG1-of (r2 / rush-01
                                                      :ARG0 p3))))
                              :ARG2 g)
                        :mod (a7 / also)))))

comment: These two things cannot both be true . Is House Democrats case so overwhelming that it was enough to impeach a president ? Or is their case so weak and incomplete that they need the Senate to redo it ? They can t even stick to one story .
amr:
